title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 19 ยง 174.10 - Disqualifying disability
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 19 ยง 174.10 - Disqualifying disability

State Regulations
A disqualifying disability shall mean: having a physical or
mental disability or disability by reason of intoxication or the use of, addiction to or dependence on alcohol or drugs which, as determined by the
department, renders the applicant unable to perform the essential functions of
the security guard positions, with or without reasonable accommodation, or who, as determined by the department poses a direct threat to health or
safety. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 19

174.10

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
